effect.name: Draw Box
effect.description: Draw a colored box on the input video
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.w
Width (px)
parameter.comment:
Width of the box in pixel.
A width of 1 does not draw a line

parameter.name: av.h
Height (px)
parameter.comment:
Height of the box in pixel.
A height of 1 does not draw a line

parameter.name: av.color
Color
parameter.comment:
Select a color for the line.
Use the Alpha value to make the line semi-transparent.

parameter.name: av.t
Thickness (px)
parameter.comment: Sets the thickness for the line in pixels

parameter.name: av.replace
Replace color and alpha
parameter.comment:
If the input has alpha, checking this
will overwrite the video's color and alpha pixels with the pixels of the painted box.
By default, the box will be composited onto the input, leaving the video's alpha intact.
